::DarkMouse::

She stood there. "I want to talk to you. I have ....." she thought 
for a moment.  She knew Megatron could see and hear her.  BUt she had 
to help her commander any way she could.
"I have somethinig of value to you if you will talk to me."
She was willing to give up everything under Megaron if only to follow 
Quickstrike.  Her programming kept her under his control.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Black Aracnia put the bowcaster in its holster and noisely 
dragged the 
> unconscience Quickstrike to the brig. She locked his cell and left 
him with a 
> pack of ration that would sustain him.
>     Returning to the bridge she saw the rodent still pokeing around 
outside. 
> Enough was enough.
>     "Listen, Darkmouse, I have your Quickstrike prisoner. I suggest 
you go 
> now or I will definetly hurt him. Shew, go now, before I sic the 
Autoguns on 
> you!"
